name: MVorpheus "Content Organizer"
description:
Using Word, Google Docs and other software's Outlining Features become quite cumbersome when keeping track of Characters, Locations, Objects and Ideas. MVorpheus is created to streamline this process so that you can spend more time thinking and less time Organizing.

At the start click on the Tutorial Button for a short video on how to use it. And from there you are free to explore and use it the way you want. Happy Creating.
